FAQs    Contact         News & Events           Calendar of Events    Annual Events    Past Events         Resources & Services           Pop-Up Pantry    Individual Consultations    Homeless Assistance    Wellness Supplies    Stress Relief Place    Sexual Health/ Healthy Relationships    Literature Library & Videos    Alcohol & e-CHUG    Studying    Conflict Management    Sleep         Workshops           Workshops Offered    Request a Workshop         Policies           Alcohol and Other Drug    Smoke Free Campus Policy and Fine Payment    Student Disciplinary Policy    Cannabis Policy          Eyebrow menu    UIC Connection    Student Affairs    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search                              Wellness Center       Stress Relief Place      View Menu           Breadcrumbs   Wellness Center    Resources & Services    Stress Relief Place        Stress Relief Place  Stress is a part of everyday life, especially when you are a college student. The demands from your educational workload, along with day-to-day responsibilities, can be the source of stress.  Stress is the response to an event or situation that calls for change, threatens the order or safety of life, or places an unusual demand on your physical, mental, and emotional resources.  You can request an individual consultation with a Wellness Center Health Educator if you are experiencing stress and need a new way to help manage its impact on your life.  Remember: You are still in control! · Breathe deep, in and out slowly · Tell yourself, “I can do this.”       Managing Stress by Brain Smart           7 Simple Ways to Reduce Our Stress           17 Science-Based Ways to Relieve Stress           Stress management Strategies: Ways to Unwind           10-minute Breathing Exercises              Resources & Services           Pop-Up Pantry    Individual Consultations    Homeless Assistance    Wellness Supplies    Stress Relief Place    Sexual Health/ Healthy Relationships    Literature Library & Videos    Alcohol & e-CHUG    Studying    Conflict Management    Sleep
